Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 30th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1976...
Injured on 4/29/1977 with a Bruised Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/28/1977 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1983, off David Terrill (BC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1983, off Ernest Perkins (NE)...
Injured on 8/21/1984 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Toledo on 2/19/1985 (Going to PIT: P W. Eyman. Going to TOL: P D. Castrejon, LF L. Jackson)...
Injured on 6/1/1986 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/9/1987 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 7/23/1987 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 4/14/1992 to a minor league deal...
